short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the intensity of PUBG Battlegrounds to your browser with an immersive live wallpaper capturing the thrill of survival. 🎮💥

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a battlefield with visuals inspired by the high-stakes world of PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds. Whether you’re a seasoned warrior or a casual explorer of Erangel, this live wallpaper is the perfect way to showcase your love for the game. Immerse yourself in the essence of survival, strategy, and action every time you open a tab.

Key Features
🎮 Epic PUBG Scenery: Stunning wallpaper inspired by the battle royale world.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search quickly and efficiently without leaving the game’s vibe.
🕒 Clock & Date: Keep track of time with an integrated clock and date display.
🎯 Customizable Shortcuts: Add and manage shortcuts for easy navigation.
🔗 Manage Extensions: "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links in the bottom-left corner.

Step into the battleground every time you browse, and let the action of PUBG Battlegrounds inspire your day. A perfect addition for fans of adrenaline-fueled battle royale gameplay!
